title: Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) Review: The best tablet option for just about everyone
content:
When Apple announced it would be building its own silicon to replace Intel processors a couple of years ago, the tech industry didn’t know what to expect. Intel’s processors had been so dominant for so long, that even the most diehard Apple fans weren’t sure Apple silicon could truly power laptops. And then not only

The post Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) Review: The best tablet option for just about everyone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The new iPad Air 5 (2022) with M1 is super powerful and ideal for most people, getting both fun and work done in one package. Read our review
